metadata.title: CVE-2019-10723 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PoDoFo 0.9.6. The PdfPagesTreeCache class in doc/PdfPagesTreeCache.cpp has an attempted excessive memory allocation because nInitialSize is not validated.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
